name: D&D 5E Barbarian Class Module
description: This script is a Barbarian Class Module add-on for the Dungeon Master Tools.This module requires the Dungeon Master Tools and provides support for common Barbarian Actions, such as Rage. **API Commands:**See the Dungeon Master Tools for a full list of api commands that the full frame provides**!dm-action <module> <action> [<options>]** - Used to dispatch an action to a class module**!dm-action barbarian rage target gender*** - If the target has the rage action, an Rage Item is added to the turn order, the target has the 'rage icon' applied, the 'Rage Damage' global modifier is checked, and a Rage message is sent to Chat

useroptions.name: tokenIcon-rage
